name: Mario & the Maze of the Fallen Pharaons
name_original: Mario & the Maze of the Fallen Pharaons
description:
Mario was in expedition in a pyramid to finding a jewerly for his promise, Peach, until the structure began to collapse.

Help Mario to get out of the maze in the pyramid. Control him with the directional arrows. Collect the coins to open the doors and avoid the enemies to survive. Warning, time is counted 

This game is a "die and retry", it's normal if it's difficult.

Project made for the purpose of student activity.

Game implemented by : LASPOUMADERES Maxim, KINDERSTUTH Etienne

Credit : Characters : Super Mario™

                Music : Super Mario™ ( Desert Theme - New Super Mario Bros DS)
